lines.text: Our people once were warriors. But unlike you, Jake, they were people with mana, pride; people with spirit. If my spirit can survive living with you for eighteen years, then I can survive anything.
[to Beth]
Cook the man some fucking eggs!
Well fuck off, then! You'll get nothing from me.
You have nothing I want, Jake.
Beth Heke?
What now?
He's been keeping bad company.
Was that before or after you picked him up?

I bought seafood today - bloody everything! Just wanted to put a smile on her face. Think she'd let me? Not a chance. All I said was that I got laid off. Anybody would've thought I'd told her my prick had dropped off!

The British used to think the bayonet was the most lethal of all hand to hand combat weapons, till they came across our warriors, who fought with the Taiaha. You think your fist is your weapon? When I have taught you, your mind will be.
People show their true feelings when they're drunk.
Barman! Six milkshakes - easy on the ice cream!
In case you wanna know it's Jake. Jake The Muss.
[about Boogie]
He's gone! He's gone to welfare! And you slept through the whole bloody thing.
Is that all? Is that what all this slamming of fucking doors, crying and carrying on is about?
[after giving an obnoxious punk a beating]
I was right... too much weights, not enough speedwork. Useless prick.

[Leaning over Grace's open coffin]
Friends forever G.
[Gives Grace a gentle kiss]
That's all I ever meant, honest. But you're right, I'm just a stupid kid who lives in an old wreck of a car!
She loved you Man, she loved you.
Where the fuck you off to? Come have a feed boy!
Nuh.
Fuck him!
Why's everything so black, Toot?
Dunno - maybe cos we're all bloody Maoris!
Got any money?
What do you want money for? You've got everything you need right here. You got booze... food.
You're drunk.
I'm not drunk, I'm happy!
You're outta you're fucken head!
You're a fucken mess. Don't you ever speak to me again you hear?
[Beth is badly beaten up]
Jesus girl, is that the result of one hell of an orgasm or what?
You know the rules - keep your mouth shut and your legs open!
Fuck woman you look awful, go clean yourself up.
This is as cleaned up as I get you bastard.
You did this to me you bastard! I hope you spew your guts out.
Tell Jakey you love him.
That's the trouble Jake, I do.
Got your period bub? Bound to make you a bit uptight eh!
I'll kill you first!
Well go on, do it! You're still a slave Jake. To your fists. To the drink. To yourself. Well go on - kill the bloody lot of us!
You raped a 13 year old girl and sat here drinking with her father while the rest of us buried her!
You should learn to control your Missus.
Sneaking around the house laying your filthy fucking hands on my baby!
You would rather stay with a pad of fucking wankers!
Let me go you black bastard!
We are the same color, BOY!
You're still a bloody attractive woman, you know.
What? After you take after me with your fists? Make me sick.
[Throws Beth on the bed after assaulting her]
You do as you're fucking told!
